panels.description:
Circuit breaker state
- 0: Closed (normal)
- 1: Half-Open (testing)
- 2: Open (blocked)
99th percentile reconcile duration for SLO monitoring
panels.title: Reconcile p99 [1h]

panels.description: Number of pending events (normal: 0)
panels.title: Event Queue

panels.description: 99th percentile duration of WC operations

panels.description: Reconcile rate per minute - higher means faster response

panels.description:
PostgreSQL change notifications received
- ws_sse: For UI updates
- ws_wake: To wake coordinators
panels.title: DB NOTIFY → EventListener

panels.description:
Events published to Redis
- SSE: Client UI notifications
- Wake: Wake coordinators
panels.title: EventListener → Redis

panels.description: Coordinator가 수신한 Wake 신호 (Observer, WC)
panels.title: Redis → Coordinator

panels.description: Number of workspaces observed

panels.description: Observer stage duration distribution. Darker = more events at that latency.
panels.title: Observer Stage Duration Heatmap

panels.description: Observer API duration distribution. Darker = more events at that latency.
panels.title: Observer API Duration Heatmap

panels.description: WC stage duration distribution. Darker = more events at that latency.
panels.title: WC Stage Duration Heatmap

panels.description: WC operation duration distribution. Darker = more events at that latency.
panels.title: WC Operation Duration Heatmap

panels.description:
Idle workspace auto-transitions
- running_to_standby: idle timeout exceeded → container stopped
- standby_to_archived: standby timeout exceeded → archived to S3
panels.title: TTL Expirations

panels.description: TTL sync duration distribution. Darker = more events at that latency.
panels.title: TTL Sync Duration Heatmap

panels.description: Number of TTL sync operations per minute (Redis scan + DB update)
panels.title: TTL Sync Rate

panels.description: Circuit breaker call success/failure ratio
panels.title: Circuit Breaker Calls (per min)

panels.description: Requests rejected due to open circuit
panels.title: Circuit Breaker Rejections (per min)

panels.description:
External call errors by type
- retryable: Transient errors (can retry)
- permanent: Non-retryable errors
- circuit_open: Rejected due to open circuit
- unknown: Unclassified errors
panels.title: External Call Errors
